to keep in one's heart: to be unrecognizable because of having changed so much
to have the world be really small
to have have time fly like an arrow
to look forward to/count down to
to be just as it had been
to be not as good as it was
to even brush past a person is fate/karma
it seems like we only first met yesterday
to have not changed at all
to write (a poem, a name), build (a house)
to wear rubber shoes backwards/ dump somebody
deep bow/a deep curtsy (kneeling down to bow)
head; root (of a Chinese cabbage, napa cabbage) (counting unit)
